long_description: Dial in the exact feel and performance you want with the Avid SD-7 brake levers. Patented adjustable leverage allows on-the-fly adjustment without tools. Live-action viewing ports allow the rider to visually see the Speed Dial(TM) adjustment. Bend Zone(TM) levers bend rather than break on impact. Compact length accommodates one- or two-finger use.
short_description: Dial in the exact feel and performance you want with the Avid SD-7 brake levers.
